Connection module

class serial_util.connect.port_manager

A utility class for serial communication.

classmethod _open_serial(ser: Serial, logger: Logger) → Serial

Class method to open serial port.

Parameters:

  • ser (Serial) – The serial object, which contains the port specifications to open.

  • logger (logging.Logger) – The logger object.

Returns:

The serial object representing the opened serial port if successful, else None.

Return type:

Serial

Raises:

SerialException – If there is an error opening the port.

classmethod _reset_serial(ser: Serial, logger: Logger) → None

Class method to reset the serial port, closing it if it is open.

Parameters:

  • ser (Serial) – The serial object representing the port to reset.

  • logger (logging.Logger) – The logger object.

Raises:

SerialException – If there is an error closing the port.

classmethod _user_serial_select(devices)

Class method to ask user to select a serial device from the list.

Parameters:

devices (List[str]) – The list of all available serial port device names.

Returns:

The device name of the user-selected device.

Return type:

str

classmethod select_port(baudrate: int = 9600, timeout: float = 0.1, logger: Logger = None) → Serial

Class method to select the port for serial communication.

Parameters:

  • baudrate (int, optional) – The baudrate, by default 9600

  • timeout (float, optional) – The timeout, by default 0.1

  • logger (logging.Logger, optional) – The logger object, by default None

Returns:

Initialized serial port.

Return type:

serial.Serial
